email_body: We're Going "Nuts" [IMAGE] We have been trying to reach you regarding your sweepstakes entry! To contact us call, Toll Free 1-800-792-1321 Use Your Private Code when you call: DLIMZ Call 10:00 am to 10:00 pm EST Monday through Friday, 9:00 am to 9:00 pm on Saturday CALL NOW!!! 1-800-792-1321 This offer is brought to you by Consolidated Media Services. For more information and the terms and conditions of the promotional offer brought to you by CMS click here .If you do not wish to receive future mailings, click here to unsubscribe.
